availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William D. Tinsley (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Oliver Tinsley. Married to Belle Tinsley. Father to Henry Tinsley. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned twenty-five enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned 107 enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860.
